mapper.insert: INSERT INTO skill_archive (skill_id, skill_name, cd_n, cd_x, use_number, description, create_time) VALUES (#{skillId}, #{skillName}, #{cdN}, #{cdX}, #{useNumber}, #{description}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, skill_id, skill_name, cd_n, cd_x, use_number, description, create_time FROM skill_archive ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE skill_archive SET skill_id = #{skillId}, skill_name = #{skillName}, cd_n = #{cdN}, cd_x = #{cdX}, use_number = #{useNumber}, description = #{description}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
